title: Statistics for Data Science
subject: Data Science
theory:
Inferential statistics allows us to make predictions about a population based on a sample. 
**Central Limit Theorem (CLT)** states that the sampling distribution of the sample means approaches a normal distribution as sample size gets large.

interview_questions.question: Explain the Central Limit Theorem.
interview_questions.answer: Regardless of the population distribution, the distribution of sample means tends to be Normal if n > 30.

summary: Statistics bridges the gap between observed data and general truths.
